pages.text: Microdictyon was an armored worm like animal placed within Onychophora. It had 10 pairs of sclerites on the sides matched with a pair of tentacle like feetand its body was tube shaped.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
